SEARCH:
程序包 Entity

类 AccountManager

java.lang.Object
Entity.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
The AccountManager class manages multiple accounts, both current and saving accounts, and handles various operations such as deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and balance inquiries.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    AccountManager(HistoryTransactionList historyTransactionList)
    Constructs an AccountManager with the specified history transaction list.

    • withdrawFromCurrentAccount

      public boolean withdrawFromCurrentAccount(String accountName, double amount) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Withdraws an amount from a CurrentAccount by name.
      参数:
      accountName - the name of the account
      amount - the amount to withdraw
      返回:
      true if the operation was successful, false otherwise
      抛出:
      InsufficientFundsException - if there are insufficient funds or account not found

    • transfer

      public void transfer(int from, int to, double value) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Transfers an amount from one current account to another.
      参数:
      from - the index of the source account
      to - the index of the destination account
      value - the amount to transfer
      抛出:
      InsufficientFundsException - if there are insufficient funds in the source account

    • depositCurrentToSaving

      public void depositCurrentToSaving(int currentIndex, int savingIndex, double value, String selectedDuration) throws InsufficientFundsException
      Deposits an amount from a current account to a saving account.
      参数:
      currentIndex - the index of the current account
      savingIndex - the index of the saving account
      value - the amount to deposit
      selectedDuration - the selected duration for the saving account
      抛出:
      InsufficientFundsException - if there are insufficient funds in the current account

      public void setInterestRate(Double interestRate, String date)
      Sets the interest rate for a specified duration.
      参数:
      interestRate - the interest rate
      date - the duration (e.g., "15 days", "1 month", "3 months")

    • getAllInterst

      public String getAllInterst()
      Gets all interest rates as a comma-separated string.
      返回:
      a string representing all interest rates

    • getAllInterst

      public double getAllInterst(int index)
      Gets the interest rate by index.
      参数:
      index - the index of the interest rate (0 for 15 days, 1 for 1 month, 2 for 3 months)
      返回:
      the interest rate
